item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, September 12, 2024 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Kolmogorov-Arnold networks may make neural networks more understandable (36 points | 4 comments)
2. GitHub taught me to micromanage (31 points | 20 comments)
3. Why Haskell? (88 points | 105 comments)
4. Linear, symmetric, self-selecting 14-bit molecular memristors (62 points | 24 comments)
5. Closing factories will not be enough to save Volkswagen (17 points | 22 comments)
6. DEF Con 32 – AMD Sinkclose Universal Ring-2 Privilege Escalation (Not Redacted) [pdf] (93 points | 4 comments)
7. Personal carbon footprint of the rich is vastly underestimated (26 points | 10 comments)
8. Watch live as SpaceX crew carry out first-ever commercial spacewalk (31 points | 16 comments)
9. Steam Families Is Here (32 points | 10 comments)
10. Large-Scale Generation of Transit Maps from OpenStreetMap Data (169 points | 18 comments)
11. Show HN: Konty – A Balsamiq-alternative lo-fi wireframe tool for modern apps (228 points | 81 comments)
12. How to Tame Evil Dependencies (20 points | 2 comments)
13. Critical Resources and the First 14 KB (2022) (7 points | discuss)
14. Deep Purple payload successfully deployed and operational (24 points | 4 comments)
15. A MiniGolf game for Palm OS (276 points | 80 comments)
16. SpaceX Astronauts Begin Spacewalk, Putting New Spacesuits to Test (14 points | 3 comments)
17. AI took their jobs. Now they get paid to make it sound human (41 points | 28 comments)
18. Microsoft hosts a security summit but no press, public allowed (79 points | 36 comments)
19. We spent $20 to achieve RCE and accidentally became the admins of .mobi (1404 points | 327 comments)
20. The quest for a Wiki-less game (39 points | 73 comments)
21. Officer who ignored NYPD's 'courtesy cards' receives $175K settlement (35 points | 18 comments)
22. Reader-LM: Small Language Models for Cleaning and Converting HTML to Markdown (110 points | 22 comments)
23. Be a thermostat, not a thermometer (2023) (185 points | 86 comments)
24. Transparenttextures.com (250 points | 35 comments)
25. AppleWatchAmmeter (300 points | 58 comments)
26. Wild Mustang and Burro Freeze Marks (2020) [pdf] (10 points | 1 comment)
27. Why Oxide Chose Illumos (99 points | 48 comments)
28. A Uruguayan company teaches people how to turn regular cars into EVs (153 points | 87 comments)
29. Noisy neighbor detection with eBPF (212 points | 57 comments)
30. The Minneapolis Street Grid: Explained (83 points | 33 comments)
